title: 06/03/2021 - Best of The Herd
itunes:title: 06/03/2021 - Best of The Herd
description:
Colin tries to make sense of the Clippers after another surprising loss and why this has everything to do with Kawhi Leonard’s personality. He marvels at the excellence of Luka Doncic and what the Mavericks need to do in order to win a title. He talks to Heisman Trophy winner Doug Flutie about the return of the USFL. Plus, legendary Duke head coach Mike Krzyzewski joins the show to discuss his decision to retire after 41 seasons.  

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
